name: Snowday
description: Engage in VR snowfights that capture real snow play like no FPS (First Person Snowbrawler) you've played before! Throw, dodge, and sneak your way to domination of the neighborhood snowfield.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
